design.name: Colony Ship
design.description:
The colony ship is what you'll need to colonize remote planets. They'll carry 100 of your colony's population to a brave new world.

Colony ships are single-use. The ship is destroyed once a planet is colonized. Be aware that once your ship is built, 100 population will be removed from your colony and added to the ship!

design.name: Scout
design.description: Scouts are small, fast ships with no attack capability (and not much in the way of defensive capabilities, either). What they are good at, though, is getting in and out of enemy starsystems and reporting back what they found.

design.name: Fighter
design.description: Your basic fighter has average speed, low-grade weapons and low-grade shields. They make up for a general lack of firepower by being incredibly cheap to produce and fuel-efficient, allowing you to overwhealm your enemy with numbers.

upgrade.name: Plasma Cannon
upgrade.description: A plamsa cannon upgrades the firepower of your fighters so that they are twice as effective in battle.

upgrade.name: Energy Shield
upgrade.description: This shield upgrade makes your fighter twice as resilient to enemy fire.

upgrade.name: Warp Boost
upgrade.description: Allows you to boost your fleet half way to the destination in an instant.

design.name: Troop Carrier
design.description: The Troop Carrier carries ground troops which you can deploy to capture an enemy colony.
